item.title: Government shutdown live updates: Stalemate to last at least three days
item.description: The shutdown could cause hundreds of thousands of federal workers to be furloughed and a slew of key programs and services to be shuttered.

item.title: Trump administration cancels nearly $8 billion in climate funding to blue states: Vought
item.description: The announcement came on the first day of the federal government shutdown.

item.title: Hundreds of migrants mount protest in southern Mexico in bid to legalize status
item.description: Hundreds of migrants protest in southern Mexico hoping to legalize their immigration status.

item.title: Trump administration freezes $18 billion in New York City infrastructure projects, Vought says
item.description: The funding freeze for New York City came on the first day of the shutdown of the federal government after Congress failed to pass a stop-gap spending...

item.title: Alabama man files lawsuit against immigration authorities after citizen's repeat arrests in raids
item.description: An Alabama construction worker and U.S. citizen filed a lawsuit against the DHS demanding an end to the Trump administration's workplace raids.
